name: ThalassPool
description:
Venture into the abyss as a bio-drone. Don't let the abyss say goodnight. This game is experimental and is a concept game made for the 2022 Epic MegaJam game jam. 

Thalasspool is based on Thalassaphobia and submechaphobia.
RAYTRACING is enabled so it might be very GPU intensive.


You can watch the full playthrough here
